title: The Rookie Reporter
description: With The Rookie Reporter Jayne Blue takes you back to the WLUV newsroom. WLUV is the television station with nothing going for it but hot on-air talent. The Rookie Reporter is a sexy, contemporary romance that continues where The Consultant left off.There are no guarantees for a reporter and photographer in a war zone. And war photographer Ray Macmillan has seen the worst, too much. His last assignment scarred him for life and left him vowing never to work with a partner again. Until, that is, he’s forced to work with WLUV’s rookie reporter, Shelby Virtue.Shelby Virtue is young, beautiful, ambitious, and plunges head first into everything. Shelby’s taste for danger and her dangerous curves are enough to drive Mac out of his mind.Will Shelby win a spot on the air? Will she win the heart of the strong, silent, and scary war photographer? Find out in THE ROOKIE REPORTER – WLUV Book Two.Includes a bonus excerpt of THE ANCHOR – WLUV Book ThreeAnd don’t miss THE CONSULTANT – WLUV Book One
author: Jayne Blue
